verbs.description: [ARG0: survivor of 2007 minneapolis bridge collapse] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: facing] [ARG1: terror charges] authorities say the man traveled to syria to join isis departing the u s just a few weeks after collecting more than 91 000 in settlement money for his injuries abdi nur mohamed amiin ali roble syria isis band mr roble minneapolis
